document_data.name: Arrizz
document_data.mainbody: '''Arrizz''' was a [[drow]] [[elf]] in the [[Moonsea]] in the late 15{{th}} century [[DR]].
document_data.Personality: Despite being close-lipped, Arrizz never hesitated to criticize foolish or weak behavior. He truly wanted to abandoned the Moonsea area for all the bad things that had happened to him there. Arrizz never wanted to speak about Deriel again. He was still a drow inside, evil and intolerant of weakness.
